title: Trying to import some user created gym extensions
author: t2_66fy8sf
text:
I'm kind of new to python and while trying to  design an AI to play checkers I found openAI gym HAD support for board game style projects but i was able to find a user created checkers env on github but I do not know how to actually use it in a program 

this is the link to the github [https://github.com/falcondai/gym-checkers](https://github.com/falcondai/gym-checkers), but I also am not very familiar with it and just downloaded the zip
